question: Which company became the world's most valuable brand in Interbrand's 2017?
explanation: Apple became the world's most valuable brand in Interbrand's 2017 best Global Brands ranking. Apple's brand value was measured as $184,15 billion, which was grew 3 percent from the year 2016. Google is in second place with $141.7B which grew 6 percent in brand value over the past year and followed by Microsoft ($80B), Coca-Cola ($69.7B), Amazon ($64.8B), and Samsung ($59.3B).
